text: hi everybody my name is Esther and in

example I have some Korean friends that

especially about some harder things like
feelings and you know emotions it's hard
for me to say it in Korean
it's hard for them to understand me at
the same time so in that situation I
feel tucked up in but the thing is in
English there's no one word that really
means the same thing as top tappan but
the most similar word you might see is
frustrating you say if something is
tapped up at you say it is frustrating
or if you feel tough topic you would say
you feel frustrated so here are some

frustrated right

frustrated

there's too much traffic I feel
